Gasdermin d发现在心脏心律不齐中起着至关重要的作用心房颤动（AF）是心律不齐的一种常见形式，一种严重的疾病，心脏跳动得如此之快，以至于其上腔室，心房颤抖。这种不规则的心跳会增加严重状况的风险，包括心力衰竭，痴呆和中风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/gasdermin-d-found-to-play-play-a-cucial-role--n-rhent-rarhthythmias.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/gasdermin-d-found-to-play-play-play-a-cucial-role--n-rhent-rharhthythmias.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f6a6fba-dcf2-4676-9339-D28E78C0469F Thu, 27 Mar 2025 14:47:43 -0400 Gasdermin D found to play a crucial role in heart arrhythmias
KFF健康新闻“什么健康？”：斧头落在HHS上正如传言几个星期的话，卫生与公共服务部长罗伯特·肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.）公布了一项重组该部门的计划。它涉及其劳动力的缩减，以前大约是80,000人，并巩固了国会创建和授权的数十个机构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/kff-health-news-what-what-the-health-the-the-the-the-ax-falls-at-hhs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/kff-health-news-what-what-the-health-the-health-the-ax-falls-at-at-hhs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43bd0414-a331-442e-8866-5a7b970990f4 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 14:43:05 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': The ax falls at HHS
研究为头颈癌转移的基础机制提供了新的启示最近发表在工程上的一项研究阐明了头颈部鳞状细胞癌（HNSCC）转移的基础机制。该研究确定了至关重要的糖酵解酶烯醇酶2（ENO2）是与HNSCC中淋巴转移相关的重要因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/study-sheds-new-new-light-on-the-mechanism------------------------------------------------------------- news/news/news/news-news-news-news-new-light-on-the-mechanisms-underlying-head-and-head-and-neck-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/study-sheds-news-new-light-on-the-mechanism---------------------------------------- and-undllying-head-head-and-and-and-neck-neck-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=BAD16024-6649-4673-B6C9-2D12CE27D555D Thu, 27 Mar 2025 14:24:49 -0400 Study sheds new light on the mechanisms underlying head and neck cancer metastasis
同时筛查高血压和心律不齐一组29名国际专家说，同时筛查高血压和心律不齐的人可以预防数千人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/simultaneous-screening-for-hypertension-and-hypertension-and-arrhythmia-could-could-pould-povent-strokes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/simultaneous-screening-for-hypertension-and-hypertension-and-arlhythmia-could-could-pould-pover-strokes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8714cd4cd4c-86c7-4220-8e0f-1ddddddddd10b6f002 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 14:19:00 -0400 Simultaneous screening for hypertension and arrhythmia could prevent strokes
AI驱动的疗法聊天机器人显示出重大的心理健康益处根据3月27日在《新英格兰医学杂志》（New England Medicine of AI）上发布的结果，达特茅斯研究人员进行了由生成AI提供动力的治疗聊天机器人的第一次临床试验，并发现该软件导致了参与者症状的显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/ai-power-therapy-therapy-chatbot-shows-shows-simentiment-mental-mental-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/ai-power-therapy-therapy-chatbot-shows-shows-simentif--mental-mental-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b11595f1-b30f-4244-AA1B-3226EDAFCC3E Thu, 27 Mar 2025 14:10:42 -0400 AI-powered therapy chatbot shows significant mental health benefits
利用肠道微生物对抗炎症和感染尽管每天都是必需品，但营养是黑匣子。我们知道许多基于植物的食物对我们有好处，但我们并不总是知道为什么。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/harnessing-intestinal-microbes-to-combat-inflammation-and-infammation-and-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/harnessing-intestinal-microbes-to-combat-inflammation-and-inflammation-and-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=813c535c-a6c5-45af-a800-4cd7ba898243 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 13:55:12 -0400 Harnessing intestinal microbes to combat inflammation and infections
AI可帮助超声检查员在20周怀孕期间更快地检测到胎儿异常一项新的研究表明，人工智能（AI）可以帮助超声检查员在20周的怀孕筛查中识别出任何异常扫描几乎两倍，而无需降低诊断的准确性或可靠性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/AI-helps-sonographers-detect-fetal-abnormalities-faster-during-20-week-pregnancy-scan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/ai-helps-sonographers-detect-detect-fetal-abnormalities-faster-faster-derstan-dering-dering-dering-dering-der-20-20周pregnancy-scan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41ED347C-4712-4712-4A88-89C3-35A472B83223 Thu, 27 Mar 2025 12:47:44 -0400 AI helps sonographers detect fetal abnormalities faster during 20-week pregnancy scan
人工智能与病理学家相匹配，以诊断腹腔疾病新的研究表明，剑桥科学家开发的机器学习算法能够在100例中正确识别97例基于活检的乳糜泻。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/ai-matches-pathologists-indiagnosing-celiac-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250327/ai-matches-pathologists-indiagnosing-celiac-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3175A41B-635C-47FE-9BA5-76F63A118181AB Thu, 27 Mar 2025 12:41:29 -0400 AI matches pathologists in diagnosing celiac disease
